roleset.name: appear in a threatening manner
roleset.note: LOOM-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus, comparison to 'appear'. Member of VNcls exist-47.1-1, spatial_configuration-47.6 (from loom.01-v)

example.name: the one example
example.text: Leading indicators rose a slight 0.2% in September, a further indication the economy is slowing but without any clear sign of whether a recession looms.
